description:
11.181 ocv
Apply a video transform using libopencv.

To enable this filter, install the libopencv library and headers and
configure FFmpeg with --enable-libopencv.

It accepts the following parameters:


Refer to the official libopencv documentation for more precise
information:
http://docs.opencv.org/master/modules/imgproc/doc/filtering.html

Several libopencv filters are supported; see the following subsections.

filter_name.description: The name of the libopencv filter to apply.

filter_params.description: The parameters to pass to the libopencv filter. If not specified, the default values are assumed.

name: ocv

parameters.description: The name of the libopencv filter to apply.
parameters.name: filter_name

parameters.description: The parameters to pass to the libopencv filter. If not specified, the default values are assumed.
parameters.name: filter_params

source:
11.181 ocv

Apply a video transform using libopencv.

To enable this filter, install the libopencv library and headers and configure FFmpeg with --enable-libopencv.

It accepts the following parameters:

filter_name

The name of the libopencv filter to apply.

filter_params

The parameters to pass to the libopencv filter. If not specified, the default values are assumed.

Refer to the official libopencv documentation for more precise information: http://docs.opencv.org/master/modules/imgproc/doc/filtering.html

Several libopencv filters are supported; see the following subsections.
